name: Adventure of Terapets: The Crazy Scientist
storyline: Teraland is a fantastic world where humans live together with some creatures called Terapets. Lately, some strange events have been happening in Teraland... On the one side, many Terapets have been missing. What is weirdest of all is that some of them reappear looking a bit ‘different’. On the other side, some characters in white coats have appeared and nobody knows exactly what they are doing...Can you solve the mystery and find the missing Terapets?
summary: Explore Maps of the whole Teraland in a no end of completely explorable zones. Personalize your own Character and move around the whole Teraland with them. Explore the High Grass zones to capture one of the 305 Terapets that live there.
